# Dvergr Amberseed
## Overview
### Dvergr Amberseed
![[DvergrAmberseedvs2.png|Dvergr Amberseed|300]]
[[DvergrAmberseedvs2.png|open outside]]

**Price**: 50 gp

**Weight**: 1/2 lbs.

## Description
This pulverized concoction can be added to the scavenged remains of a detonated [[Amberstick|amberstick]], slowly reconstituting it over a long rest.
